text: Jwalakwe ampele jenumanja chilandanyo kuumila mu jenumanja mwachimisyene: Ana jenumanja nkwete ŵakamusyangana nao mwa (achikapolo) ŵagapatile magasa genu gakun’dyo pa (ipanje) yatumpele, mwanti jenumanja payalakweyo nkulandana (kagaŵane), ni kwajogopaga (achikapolowo) yankuti pakogopana mwachimisyene (alukosyo? Nambi uli nkum’bichila Allah akukamusyangana nao mwa achikapolo Ŵakwe)? Iyyoyopeyo ni yatukuti pagopolanya ma Ȃya kwa ŵandu ŵakwete lunda
